I need to move left to position myself to shoot the alien on the left.``` Action:2 ```

Action:2
The avatar is located in (10, 28). There are aliens on the left. I will move to the left to target the aliens. I expect the avatar to move one position to the left.

The avatar is at position (10, 27). There are several alienGreen sprites at the top of the screen.
Action: 2
I will move left to get in line with the aliens and shoot them down to protect the base.

The avatar is currently at position (10, 26). There are aliens at row 0. I should move to the left to target the aliens to protect the base.
Action: 2
```
Action: 2
```
I'm moving left to intercept the incoming aliens and protect the base.

The avatar is at (10, 25). There are many alienGreen at the top of the screen, specifically from column 2 to column 10. I should move to the left to shoot them.
Action: 2
I'm moving left to target the aliens spawning at the top.

The base is at the top left of the map and aliens are approaching from the top. The avatar is currently at (10, 24), I need to move to the left to intercept the aliens and prioritize the aliens that are closest to the base.

Action: 2
I will move left to intercept the aliens, expecting to engage them closer to the base.

The avatar is at position (10, 23). There are multiple aliens at the top row. I will move right to get into a better position to shoot them.
Action: 3

The aliens are spawning at the top. My avatar is at row 10, col 24. There are many aliens at the top. Let me move to the left to shoot the aliens.
Action: 2

The avatar is at row 10, col 23. There are many aliens at the top. I should move to the left to be under the aliens.
Action: 2

The avatar is at (10, 22), and there are aliens at the top of the screen. The base is at rows 1 and 2, and columns 0, 1, and 2.
I should move left to try and intercept the aliens.
Action: 2
I will move left to target the aliens on the left side of the screen.

The avatar 'a' is at row=10, col=21. There are many aliens '@' at row=0. The base '#' is at row 1 and 2, column 0,1,2.
To defend the base, I need to move the avatar to the left to shoot the aliens.
Action: 2
```Action: 2```
I am moving the avatar to the left, to target the aliens that are closer to the base.

The avatar is at (10, 20). There are many aliens at the top of the screen.
Action: 2
I will move left to try and get under the aliens.

The base is at the top and the avatar is near the bottom, and several aliens are approaching from the top of the screen. I should shoot them down.
Action: 1
I'll use the action to shoot at the aliens above and defend the base.

The avatar is located at row 10, col 19. There are several aliens ('@') at row 0. I will move to the left to be closer to the aliens.
Action: 2
I will move to the left to engage the aliens at the top of the screen.

The avatar is at (10, 18). There are many aliens ('@') at row 0. I will move left to be in line with those aliens.
Action: 2

Action:2
I will move left to position myself under the aliens for efficient shooting, and this aligns with the strategy of efficient shooting and targetting aliens.

The avatar is currently at position (10, 16). There are a lot of aliens at the top. To take them out, I will shoot.
Action: 1

The avatar is currently at position (10, 16). There are many aliens at the top of the screen, ranging from column 2 to column 16. My strategy suggests that I should move to avoid the enemies, prioritize aliens, and protect the base. To do that, I should move left to kill more aliens and clear the path, since there is space to move.
Action: 2

The avatar 'a' is at row=10, col=15. There are many aliens '@' at row 0. There is a 'sam' right above the avatar.

Action: 2
I will move left to position myself under one of the aliens and shoot. I expect to see the avatar move one step to the left.

The avatar is currently at (10, 14). There are many aliens '@' at the top of the screen. A 'sam' projectile is at (8, 16). I need to move right and shoot at the aliens.

Action: 3
```
Action: 3
```
I'm moving right to be in a better position to shoot down the incoming aliens.

The avatar is at row 10, col 15. There are aliens at row 0. I need to move to the left to align with the aliens.
Action: 2
I'm moving left to align with the aliens above and hopefully shoot them down.

Action:2
I will move to the left to target the aliens on the left side of the screen, attempting to eliminate them before they get closer to the base.

The avatar is at (10, 13). There are multiple aliens at row 0. The 'alien' sprites ('@') at (0, 1), (0, 2), (0, 4), (0, 5), (0, 8), (0, 14), (0, 15), (0, 17), (0, 18), (0, 20) and (0, 21) are threats. Some of them are shooting bombs ('%') at me. The base ('#') is at row 1 and 2. I should move to the left to dodge the bombs and shoot the aliens.

Action: 2
Feedback: Moving left to avoid the bombs and position myself to shoot the aliens.

The aliens are grouped at the top, and bombs are falling. I need to shoot them down to protect the base. I will shoot upwards ('use' action) to try and eliminate some of the aliens and bombs.
Action: 1

The aliens are spawning at the top of the screen and there are bombs falling towards the avatar. I should move right to avoid the bombs and position myself to shoot the aliens.

Action: 3
I'm moving right to avoid the bombs and get in a better position to shoot the aliens.

The avatar is located at row 10, column 13. There are alienGreen sprites ('@') at the top of the screen, and bombs ('&') are falling down. The strategy suggests prioritizing alien bombers and avoiding the bombs. I should move to the left to avoid the bombs, and then shoot upwards once in a better position.

Action: 2

I will move to the left to dodge the incoming bombs at (4,13), (4,14) and (5,13), (5,14), (9,11), (9,12).
